price: (29) [Pharaoh] said, "If you take a god other than me, I will surely place you among those imprisoned."
arabic: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذۡتَ إِلَٰهًا غَيۡرِي لَأَجۡعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَسۡجُونِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla la-ini ittakhadhta ilāhan ghayrī la-ajʿalannaka mina al-masjūnīna
